reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that personal information is collected, indicating that the app declares the collection of data.
reply.reference: The personal information that we collect and hold may include an individual's name, address, date of birth, email address, telephone number, workplace, and technical data. URL: https://www.thepeoplespot.com/privacy-policy

source_documents.excerpt:
Our Privacy Policy
We have designed our app with privacy in mind. We want employees to use it without being concerned about who is watching. We take privacy absolutely seriously.
About This Privacy Policy
The People Spot Pty Ltd ABN 87 648 891 696 (People Spot) has obligations concerning the collection, use, disclosure and storage of personal information. These obligations are set out in the Australian Privacy Principles (APPs) under the Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) (Privacy Act), and other applicable...

any purpose for which it was collected and is no longer required by law to be retained by us, we will destroy or de-identify the information.
Can I remain anonymous?
You can always choose to deal with us anonymously or by using a pseudonym.
However, please note that if you choose to remain anonymous, this may affect your ability to access or use certain functions of our website or services.
Why do we collect, hold, use and disclose personal information?
We collect, hold, use and disclose persona...

whom do we disclose personal information?
We may disclose personal information to the following third parties for the purposes listed above trading partners and external service providers of People Spot so that they may perform services for us or on our behalf.
When we disclose personal information to third parties, we make all reasonable efforts to ensure that we disclose only relevant information and that it is accurate, complete and up to date and that the third party will comply with the Pri...

legal claim;
It is requested by an enforcement agency such as the police; or
It is a necessary part of an investigation following a complaint or incident.
Disclosure of personal information outside Australia
Some of the third parties to whom we may disclose personal information may be located overseas. The countries in which those third parties may be located are:
· United States;
Where we disclose information outside of Australia, we will take reasonable steps to ensure that any such person to ...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information such as name, address, date of birth, email address, telephone number, workplace, and technical data like IP address, device types, browser type, language, and operating system.

content: Technical data (IP address, device types, browser type, language, operating system)

reply.analysis: The app collects a range of personal information and technical data as outlined in the privacy policy.
reply.reference: The personal information that we collect and hold may include an individual's: · name; · address; · date of birth; · email address; · telephone number and other contact details; · workplace; and · technical data, which may include IP address, the types of devices you are using to access the website, device attributes, browser type, language and operating system. URL: https://www.thepeoplespot.com/privacy-policy

Cookies
A “cookie” is a small file stored by the web browser software on a computer when you access our website. (An explanation of cookies can be found at the website of the Australian Information Commissioner at www.oaic.gov.au.
We use a persistent cookie for tracking a user's browsing behaviour upon return to our website / for statistical purposes and to improve our website / any other reason cookies are used.
You may refuse the use of cookies by se...

use.
We analyse this non-identifiable website traffic data (including through the use of third party service providers) on an aggregated basis to improve our services and for statistical purposes.
No attempt will be made to identify users or their browsing activities except in the unlikely event of an investigation, where a law enforcement agency may exercise a warrant to inspect the Internet Service Provider's log files.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the purposes for which personal information is collected, held, used, and disclosed, including enabling access to services, managing relationships, sending marketing messages, running business activities, sending support messages, and legal compliance.
reply.reference: We collect, hold, use and disclose personal information for the following purposes: to enable you to access and use our website, app and services; to manage our relationship and communicate with you; to engage in and send marketing and promotional messages to you and other information that has been requested or which may be of interest; to run our general business activities, and to operate, improve and optimise our website and services and yours and other users' experience; to send support and administrative messages, reminders, technical notices, updates, security alerts, and information to you; and to comply with our legal obligations. URL: https://www.thepeoplespot.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can choose to remain anonymous or use a pseudonym, which implies the ability to opt-out of data collection. Additionally, the policy mentions that personal information will be destroyed or de-identified when it is no longer required.
reply.reference: You can always choose to deal with us anonymously or by using a pseudonym. However, please note that if you choose to remain anonymous, this may affect your ability to access or use certain functions of our website or services. If the information is no longer required by us for any purpose for which it was collected and is no longer required by law to be retained by us, we will destroy or de-identify the information. URL: https://www.thepeoplespot.com/privacy-policy

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as listed in the privacy policy document.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app shares data with trading partners and external service providers of People Spot for various purposes.
reply.reference: We may disclose personal information to the following third parties for the purposes listed above trading partners and external service providers of People Spot so that they may perform services for us or on our behalf. URL: https://www.thepeoplespot.com/privacy-policy
